NOTES COFFEE ROASTERS & BARS

bookings

Christmas bookings

Here at Notes you can always be sure of a friendly welcome. Our cosy spaces are perfect to drop by for that human connection we’ve all missed so much this past year.

We do take bookings but only offer a few tables at any one time for reservations, so you’ll always have a good chance of getting a spot if you turn up.

In short, we salute the spontaneous and worship the walk-ins, and we can’t wait to see you!

For larger groups we offer flexible spaces for private hire or group bookings of 6 or more, every day from 5pm. Our events team is on hand to ensure your evening is planned to perfection. Just fill in the form below and we'll get straight back to you.
